'Quintessence' is out now

‘Quintessence’ is out now. Listen here

In order to make the new album available for all around the same time, ‘I Tell A Fly’ will now be released globally on September 29th (October 2nd in the US). Pre-order here

Brussels Show Rescheduled

The performance at Cirque Royal, Brussels on November 25th has now been moved to the Ancienne Belgique and rescheduled for November 8th, 2017. All tickets purchased remain valid, and for those who cannot attend the new date, please request your reimbursement before September 30th, 2017 from the point of purchase.

An interview and live footage will feature in Nina Conti’s Edinburgh Festival today at 7:30PM on BBC2.
